docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to my three-dimensional space!

My name is Krystian Rosiński [1] and I'm a civil engineer. I'm currently located in Toruń, Poland and working as a Project Manager. Aside from that I'm interested in structural mechanics [2], technical computing [3] and typesetting in LaTeX.

  1. Contact me via mail or LinkedIn
  2. I am a member of PTMTS
  3. Find me on GitHub

For more information, see Projects and Publications.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: On this page you will find selected projects in which I recently participated.

docs.title: Commercial
docs.text:
• Przy Skarpie 10D in Toruń for LEM-BUD as Project Manager
  • Fordońska 428 in Bydgoszcz for LEM-BUD as Project Manager
  • Szosa Lubicka 13 in Toruń for LEM-BUD as Project Manager
  • Szpital Pomnik Chrztu Polski in Gniezno for ALSTAL as Project Engineer
  • many more as cost estimator and leader of cost estimation team for ALSTAL

docs.title: Business applications
docs.text:
• Marker – CRM for General Contractors as Project Creator and Software Developer
  • contract – Generate contracts from docx template and yaml file data

docs.title: Technical computing
docs.text:
• tim_autograd – Solution of Simply Supported Rectangular Plates under Sinusoidal Load using Automatic Differentiation
  • surf_grid – Surface reconstruction from scattered data points
  • skar.py – Extract coords of points from DXF file as NumPy arrays and plot surface

docs.title: Slides
docs.text:
• Analytical-numerical method of solving thin plates
  • Solution of Thin Rectangular Plates with Various Boundary Conditions
